formulas.description: GTMS-28587 Convert buyout amount to USD for $500K threshold check. Uses CURRENCYRATE to convert non-USD currencies.
formulas.name: BuyoutAmountInUSD

formulas.description: Added as part of bug fix for, GTMS-23353, Buyout Warning Message Issue, When comparing Opportunity's Buyout amount with Quote's buyout amount, the -ve sign of the opportunity must be ignored, thus adding another -ve to cancel it out using this formula
formulas.name: OpptyBuyoutAmountToCalculate

formulas.description: Added as part of bug fix for, GTMS-23353, Buyout Warning Message Issue, When comparing Opportunity's Subsidy amount with Quote's Subsidy amount, the -ve sign of the opportunity must be ignored, thus adding another -ve to cancel it out using this formula
formulas.name: OpptySubsidyAmountToCalculate

formulas.description: GTMS-16291, 16287: formula to check OV criteria
formulas.name: OVCritetiacheck
formulas.expression: AND( ISPICKVAL({!ClosingOpportunity.Type},'Revenue Opportunity'), NOT({!ClosingOpportunity.SBQQ__Renewal__c}), NOT({!ClosingOpportunity.Custom_Schedule__c}), {!ClosingOpportunity.Owner_Segment__c} != 'AE1', NOT(ISBLANK({!ClosingOpportunity.Owner_Role_Copy__c})), NOT(CONTAINS({!ClosingOpportunity.Owner_Role_Copy__c},'SLED')), NOT(ISBLANK({!ClosingOpportunity.Owner_Manager_Role_Copy__c})), NOT(CONTAINS({!ClosingOpportunity.Owner_Manager_Role_Copy__c},'SLED')), OR( AND( {!ClosingOpportunity.Finance_Segment__c}='Enterprise', {!ClosingOpportunity.Is_Webstore_Upsell_Opportunity__c} ), {!ClosingOpportunity.Finance_Segment__c}='Mid Market' ), {!ClosingOpportunity.Payment_Type__c}<>'Reseller', {!ClosingOpportunity.Payment_Type__c}<>'Finance Partner', NOT(CONTAINS({!ClosingOpportunity.Name},'InventorySplit')), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!ClosingOpportunity.Selected_Payment_Type__c},'Direct Quarterly')), ISBLANK({!ClosingOpportunity.Buyout_Opportunity__c}), ISBLANK({!ClosingOpportunity.Subsidy_Opportunity__c}), IF( OR( ISPICKVAL({!ClosingOpportunity.CurrencyIsoCode},'EUR'), ISPICKVAL({!ClosingOpportunity.CurrencyIsoCode},'GBP') ), ISPICKVAL({!ClosingOpportunity.VAT_Validation_Status__c},'Confirmed'), true ), OR( AND( ISPICKVAL({!ClosingOpportunity.Payment_Terms__c},'Due in Advance'), ISPICKVAL({!ClosingOpportunity.Initial_Payment_Terms__c},'Due in Advance') ), AND( CONTAINS(TEXT({!ClosingOpportunity.Payment_Terms__c}),'Net'), CONTAINS(TEXT({!ClosingOpportunity.Initial_Payment_Terms__c}),'Net') ) ) )

formulas.description: Added as part of bug fix for GTMS-23424, Buyout Amount - Null vs $0, If the quote's buyout amount is null, use 0 instead which is calculated by this formula
formulas.name: QuoteBuyoutAmountToCalculate

formulas.description: Added as part of bug fix for GTMS-23424, Buyout Amount - Null vs $0, If the quote's Subsidy amount is null, use 0 instead which is calculated by this formula
formulas.name: QuoteSubsidyAmountToCalculate

formulas.description: GTMS-16291, 16287 : to return error message for Uncalculated or Wrong Docusign validation
formulas.name: UncalculatedOrDocusignValidationError

value.stringValue: Submit to Closing Flow New UI

recordLookups.description: GTMS-14415.13581: Replaced Teaming_Partner__c field with Teaming_partner_Account__c field
recordLookups.name: Look_Up_Opportunity
recordLookups.label: Look Up Opportunity

recordLookups.description: GTMS-16291, 16287 : to get Uncalculated and Docusign Disclaimer field from Primary Quote related to account.
recordLookups.name: Look_Up_Primary_Quote
recordLookups.label: Look Up Primary Quote

subflows.name: Get_Submit_To_Closing_New_UI
subflows.label: Get Submit To Closing New UI

textTemplates.name: WorkAroundDocumentLink
textTemplates.text: Please review the Known Workaround Document. If that doesnt solve the issue, please create a ticket with SalesOps.
